My LIQUID KILL #1 cover! 🌃 Available next February from @whatnotpublishing ! 
🔥In Shops: Feb 15, 2023
Order Code: DEC221745 – LIQUID KILL #1 CVR A INFANTE (MR)
By @acrowyouknow & @iumazark 🖤

#coverart #liquidkill #illustration #digitalart #coverart #toniinfante

Happy 35th anniversary #FinalFantasy !! From Amano to Uematsu, from I to XVI this series keep inspiring us to follow our passion and take new roads.🙏 

✨️ Which one is your favourite??

All of us have a personal favourite, mine is 7 and 9. Mostly because the themes and backstories. The ecologism shown on ff7 is even more important today, and the philosophical dilemmas from Vivi are universal questions that we will try to answer forever.

Congratulations and to many more to come! 🥳🎊

#finalfantasy #vivi #illustration #squareenix #toniinfante #tidus #digitalart

My GRIM 6 Variant Cover for @boom_studios ! 💀🔥 Cover available now on your local comic shop!! Have a great weekend everyone!!

#illustration #cover #digitalart #demon #toniinfante

Back from a shdowban 🫡 Full Cover Artwork for the Shin Megami Tensei III Vinyl BOX! 😈 Really excited about how this turned out!
Check out the small glimpse on the process, where I used the Gradient Maps tool to translate the grayscale work into colors. It's a great and fast way to work with monochromatic pieces or just explore some ideas!

★ Full process and insight on my patreon!
And OST Vinyl Box available on the fangamer store!!
Thank you @Fangamer !! 🤍🖤😍

#cover #illustration #toniinfante #jrpg #videogames #shinmegamitensei

My BRIAR💀🌹 Variant Cover from @boomstudios.  Really enjoyed playing with a different color scheme and lighting!✨ I love pink. And who doesn't?
Thank you so much for your support as always everyone. You make all the effort worth it 🔥🖤 Hope you have a great weekend!! 🤙🫡
+process insight on my patreon as always!

#coverart #comics #digitalart #illustration #toniinfante

Happy #PokemonDay everyone!✨️ Kanto feels like home to me.😌 Which was your first game? 🙌

Finally got my copies of the ImagineFX Magazine 221!! 
I have been a reader for 10 years, and damn,  it's kind of surreal and exiting being there with an interview. Thank you all of you who inspires me everyday, and supports me on this journey 😍🙌 And thank you  @imaginefxmagazine  team!
The Berserk illustratiom workshop is from the @kaibun_es 2 cover!! 🙌🙌

#illustration #digitalart #toniinfante #imaginefx #fanart

Kageyama ☆ #Haikyuu Addicted to this show again. Anyone else??🙌🫡
Full process on my patreon!!🙏
#illustration #sketch #anime #fanart

Shin Megami Tensei III Back Cover for the official Vinyl Box! 👹🔥 Full process already on my patreon + TIP below! Vinyls available on the @fangamernet store too! @atlus_west

★Still remember when drawing 3 characters on a single cover was a pain, but after many of those, managed to scale, and produce massive pieces like that without dying. Silhouettes and thinking on them like big shapes instead of unique objects can do the trick. And always think on making the focus point easy readable... then comes the rest!

And if you are wondering...25 characters here! 🫠🫠

#jrpg #videogames #shinmegamitensei #atlus #toniinfante

🔥❄️ Summer or winter?? I'm more a summer person. I need sun to feel great, and love going to beach or elsewhere for the weekend. ⛰️🥾🏖 However winter is wanting to stay on the sofa with my cat, blanket and eating shit while feeling half depressed 🤣🫡 

These two are one of my more iconic pieces from 2017 and 2018, but still happy with them! First one was the cover for Husks 2 a novel written by @digiwombat
!! Available on amazon!

★Btw, these are available on my PRINTSHOP + Tutorials on my GUMROAD.
Have a great day!!

#digitalart #illustration #toniinfante

My Behold Behemoth #4 Variant cover! From @boom_studios 🔥🌅
★ Tried a different color palette than usual. With strong yellows and purple as a complementary color. SWIPE for a discarded actionpacked sketch + more insight on the cover on my patreon as always!!

Link 💫 from the very first The Legend of Zelda! He makes 37 this year, but still looking hot 🔥🔥

Will also share the full picture this week + full process for patrons🖤🤍 Thanks a lot for your continous support and for sharing your love for zelda and my work 💚 You make this thing possible🙇

My spokon tribute cover for @kaibun_es !! 🏐🏀⚾️ Haikyuu, Slam Dunk, Yawara.. 🙌🧡 Can you spot your favorite spokon manga??👀

★This one took a while to finish, it's a crowded cover you know! Hope you like these kind of work, my favorite part is to see how you people find a favorite character or recognize a niche manga there. 

★Full process will be available this week on patreon! And magazine available on kaibun.es!!

#manga #spokon #kaibun #toniinfante #illustration #digitalart #cover #slamdunk #Haikyuu #tsubasa

Hope everyone is having a nice week!! 🔥🔥🤙

The Immortal THOR #3!⚡My contribution to the New Champions covers for @Marvel , where I created a new sidekick for Thor! All these variants are not canon characters, but had a great time working on her anyway!!

🔥Swipe to see part of the process and a rough concept! And as always, you can check my patreon for the full cover process. Thanks a ton for the support and hope you have a great weekend ahead!!🏖

 #illustration #marvel #thor #toniinfante #coverart #comicbooks

The Four Horsemen 💀🐴🔥from the #ShinMegamiTenseiIII official vinyl box!
Still available on fangamer. These are some of the most iconic bosses from the game 🙌

★Working on monochromatic images like these are way easier using Gradient Maps, and then add some color variations on top. Do you use them??
Full process and these + Layered PSD+ insight as always on PATREON! 🙏

#illustration #atlus #shinmegamitensei #videogame #horses

CODA is back! (And read below for a quick TIP!✨) Here's my variant Cover for issue 1, out in September from @boomstudios and interiors by the amazing team @sispurrier and @matiasbergara! 

⚡From now on, going to share QUICK TIPS from my PATREON on some posts descriptions and images. Some short but hopefully useful thoughts!🖌

★TIP★
I plan everything including color on the FIRST ROUGH (included on the last image post!) that not only helps to your client to get a better idea about the final piece, but also makes the rest of your process smoothly! It doesn't matter if this stage can take you a whole day, if you come up with a great concept!

#illustration #coverart #digitalart #toniinfante #comicbooks #coda

Kafka from @honkaistarrail joins the fight! 💥💥 Here's 5 TIPS to create DYNAMIC POSES. From rough sketch to last touches! Hope you find some of these useful! 

🙌 RAISE your hand if you will try to get Kafka in the game #FacesofKafka #Kafka

Full illustration for Kafka from @honkaistarrail !💥 Thanks for the good feedback and comments on the previous 5 TIPS REEL, there's more to come! 
And visit my PATREON for the full process + weekly updates!🙏❤️‍🔥 

Also... 👀SWIPE to see the early rough lines made on my notebook.

★TIP!! 🖌 The halftones added at the end gives that final punch to the image. that is something I'm adding lately for the last touches. I use Kyle's halftones from photoshop, but you can also tries the ones from Procreate, these are also great!

#FacesofKafka #Kafka #honkai #toniinfante #illustration

“Link, you are our final hope!”
.
Incredibly excited to announce our #TearsOfTheKingdom Japanese poster with Spanish artist @toni.infante! Taking inspiration from classic Studio Ghibli posters, this scene marks the start of Link’s incredible journey before he takes his breathtaking leap of faith during the game’s incredible opening sequence. ⚔️💚🧝🏻‍♂️
.
Prints are 24”x36” printed with vivid UV litho inks. Exclusively available at our booth during #fanexpocanada! North Building #3603.
.

#tearsofthekingdom
#nintendo

My cover for Mighty Morphin Power Rangers #113!!⚡️✨ Out this month! @boom_studios

⚡️So many memories drawing this team! I was totally hooked with that show and got many toys in my childhood! I'm crurious tho, how many of you grew up with the first PR generation or which one did you watched?? Have a great week everyone!!🔥🔥

+As always, full step by step akd insight now on my patreon!🤍

#powerrangers #coverart #illustration #toniinfante #comicbooks

My cover for Alabaster!💀 A reimagining take from the original Osamu Tezuka's work by @noircaesar ! 
Kickstarter is now LIVE!! Link on my profile or story!

#alabaster #osamutezuka #manga #cover

Pink Ranger is BADASS🔥 Here's my cover for #PowerRangers Unlimited: The Morphin Masters! 🏹⚡A dark infection spreads on this issue... @boom_studios 

★ So happy to share a new MMPR cover with you guys, and I'm sure it won't be the last! 

★ It's always though to include so many characters on a single image, but if you struggle on that, remember to adjust values and think on levels of depth. Keep the main focus on one or few characters, and use sizes and values to make the rest less prominent!

★Also SWIPE to see a sketch progress image! Thanks a ton everyone and have an amazing day! (even on Monday 🫠)

#powerrangers #comicbooks #coverart #pinkranger #toniinfante

My cover for Void Rivals #6! 🚀First one for @skyboundent and one of the new Robert Kirkman projects set on the Transformers universe. And is Out now!!🔥

Swipe for more details and a rough sketch before colors!

#coverart #illustration #digitalart #toniinfante #robertkirkman

My 4th @kaibun_es cover is coming tomorrow! Stay tuned for the full reveal ⚔️🌊👹 Any guesses? 👀 
★ Manga made me who I am. Defined my profession, style and connected me with so many wonderful people. Swipe to see the past covers where I pay tribute to the authors and series that shaped this medium 🔥🏀🤖

Oh and prints available on my store too!

Have a wonderful week!

@gamestribune 
 #kaibun #illustration #manga #ink

Raise your katana samurai! 🎴🌊
Here's my @kaibun_es cover paying tribute to the samurai genre, have you read them all? 👀 Also.. Subscribe to kaibun and get the black and white special edition! Magazine in spanish 🇪🇸

★Sword of the inmortal left me a huge impression to me back in the days I was starting my art journey. I was obsessed on how Samura sensei draw feet and hands! 

Vagabond is a storytelling masterpiece than anyone should read, and the same with Samurai champloo, but because different reasons! The mixing of styles, music...

★ Full cover process is now on my patreon as well! THANK YOU!

#illustration #ukiyoe #japan #manga
#kaibun #samurai #anime #kimetsunoyaiba

Grateful for 2023. Brought so many unexpected projects, started working on Magic, and finished several projects for Atlus, Square Enix and Marvel. Thank YOU for supporting me trough this journey, and to all clients that believed in me for their projects!🖌️🎨

Most of them are still to be revealed, but in the meantime, excited for what 2024 can bring!! 🔥🔥

If anything, I miss helping and provide more tutorials online, haven't done it enough and hope to double down on that! 🙏🙏

Special thanks to @pepablackmanart for driving this road with me, and friends and family for staying always there.❤️❤️

Be kind and sending the best energy for this year folks!🎉🤍

Any indian food lovers around here?🍛 New flavours and approach for this cover.🤍🖤 Rare Flavours 4 out next February from @boom_studios ! 

#illustration #cover #coverart #digitalart #toniinfante #boomstudios
